rooms.name: Living and Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living space that includes a dining area. Mediterranean style elements like arches and terracotta tiles are incorporated to reflect local design aesthetics.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen equipped with stainless steel fixtures and energy-efficient appliances, ensuring adherence to local building norms and Vastu principles by positioning it in the south-east corner of the plan.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated entertainment space with soundproofing, comfortable seating, and ambient lighting. Designed to provide a private viewing experience while maintaining Mediterranean aesthetics.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Fully equipped gymnasium with modern fitness equipment. The layout respects Vastu guidelines by ensuring proper natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Corridor
rooms.description: Connects various rooms on the ground floor; designed to allow smooth movement while preserving privacy.

openings.description: Large entrance door with Mediterranean styling and energy-efficient design.
Multiple windows strategically placed for optimal ventilation, natural lighting in accordance with Vastu principles.
